scripts.build: java -jar closure.jar --compilation_level SIMPLE --warning_level QUIET --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --language_in ECMASCRIPT_2017 --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2017 --js lib/BinaryHeap.js source/utils/LRU.js source/utils/Enum.js source/utils/HelperUtils.js source/utils/VersionUtils.js source/utils/workers/WorkerManager.js source/Potree.js source/PointAttributes.js source/Gradients.js source/Points.js source/Shader.js source/WebGLTexture.js source/WebGLBuffer.js source/Shaders.js source/pointcloud/DEM.js source/pointcloud/DEMNode.js source/pointcloud/PointCloudTree.js source/pointcloud/PointCloudArena4D.js source/pointcloud/PointCloudOctree.js source/pointcloud/geometries/PointCloudOctreeGeometry.js source/pointcloud/geometries/PointCloudArena4DGeometry.js source/pointcloud/geometries/PointCloudGreyhoundGeometry.js source/pointcloud/materials/PointCloudMaterial.js source/loaders/LASLoader.js source/loaders/BinaryLoader.js source/loaders/GreyhoundUtils.js source/loaders/GreyhoundLoader.js source/loaders/GreyhoundBinaryLoader.js source/loaders/POCLoader.js source/loaders/LASLAZLoader.js source/objects/BasicGroup.js source/objects/Group.js --js_output_file ./build/potree.min.js
